page.title: 20LODSWORTH, FURTHER READING
page.content:
Books: {Doris Gundry: }Midhurst Petworth
{Wilfrid Lamb:}Notes for a history of Lodsworth.1962 (Private circulation) a copy may be seen at Easebourne Primary School
{M. Reed:}Social and economic relations in a Wealden community:Lodsworth 1780- 1860(University of Sussex unpublished M.A.dissertation,1982)
{Jack Corbett:}editor of {OUTLOOK}the parish magazine.
{Thanks }to all parents friends and relations who helped the 26 boys and girls (7-9 years) of Class 2, Easebourne Primary School to visit and record their findings. W.J.Sellers.
